Text: OK thanx for the file, but how do u use it? Do I replace the JAP PF file with ur PPF file?
You should use PPFOMATIC (search via google) to apply this patch, i've tested, it works. Some player names are still to be translated.

100% names translated
dont forget to delete your old option file from memory card and create a new to get update from the iso

enjoy it
Awesome patch, works a treat, now just to get rid of the awful jap commentary :-)
